product_name: CycleOps Mag Bike Trainer with Shifter - 2014
long_description: Take your riding routine indoors during bad weather with the CycleOps Mag bike trainer. It uses a remote shifter so you can adjust resistance as you ride, letting you tailor your training on the fly. Updated frame works with all standard wheels and now works with 29er mountain bike wheels (fits treads to 2.25 in.). 5 position, handlebar-mounted shifter makes it easy to adjust resistance to vary the intensity of training. With a smooth, quiet ride, locking bolt ring and heavy-duty steel construction, you're ready train. The Cyclops Mag bike trainer with shifter features adjustable foot pads, a quick release handle and folding legs for storage.
